operation.command: update B{SCHEMA_NAME}.ADRESSE set ADREML = 'dsi_production+emailnonsynchronise@cafat.nc' where ADRCAF = '01900000000001'

select 1 from sgengpp.gpp_email a  inner join sgengpp.gpp_moyen_contact m on m.id = a.id_fk_moyen_contact  inner join sgengpp.gpp_personne_physique p on m.fk_personne_physique = p.numero_interne  where p.matricule = '9999999'  and m.date_fin_validite is null and a.adresse like 'assure.divers@cafat.nc%'
update B{SCHEMA_NAME}.ADRESSE set ADREML = 'dsi_production@cafat.nc' where ADRCAF = '01900000000001'
